author: barrettj
msg: Contributed by Dustin Amrhein.  WSDL is only attached for SOAP11.  If the WSDL exists, it should be attached to the service for SOAP12 as well.

author: scheu
msg: Upgrade the "by type" marshalling/unmarshalling to include all classes that don't have @XmlRootElement

author: ajith
msg: 1. The JXR reports have been neglected (available in the primary site) - Hence added them back
I. also added a jxr.xml to act as the home for jxr reports
2. Due to the size of the documentation moved the documentation to a seperate zip file
3. Changed index,download and POM to reflect these new changes
Note - these changes also need to take place in the XMLSchema trunk

author: dwoods
msg: GERONIMO-2609 - On linux and maybe other platform, the geronimo.out log file contains invalid characters
None of these messages are getting displayed in the latest 2.0 code, but cleaning up for completeness.
Changed println() to not use "/r", which is the invalid char in the 1.1.1 output.
Switched shutdown word "begun" to "started" to match the "Server shutdown completed" phrasing.
